#define BUFFER_SIZE   0x400

Max buffer length

Definition at line 38 of file i2s_mclk.c.

#define I2S_BUFFER_DST   (I2S_BUFFER_SRC+0x1000UL)

I2S Buffer Destination Address is (AHBRAM1_BASE + 0x100UL) that used for USB RAM purpose, but it is not used in this example, so this memory section can be used for general purpose memory

Definition at line 48 of file i2s_mclk.c.

#define I2S_BUFFER_SRC   LPC_AHBRAM1_BASE

I2S Buffer Source Address is AHBRAM1_BASE that used for USB RAM purpose, but it is not used in this example, so this memory section can be used for general purpose memory
